label: {{ gdc_type }}
wrangling_procedure: Data from the same sample but from different vials/portions/analytes/aliquotes is averaged; data from different samples is combined into genomicMatrix; all data is then log2(x+1) transformed.
description: More information on the GDC pipeline used to generate this data: https://docs.gdc.cancer.gov/Data/Bioinformatics_Pipelines/Expression_mRNA_Pipeline/
